name: 4K Race
overview: Unveiled at the 2004 Minigame Competition, 4k Race delivers high-speed excitement in a bite-sized package. Players tackle 7 challenging tracks, manoeuvring their cars with intuitive controls that balance simplicity and strategy. The game's dynamic tracks provide endless replayability, challenging players to master every twist and turn. Programmed by Paolo Ferraris, with graphics by Luciano Costarelli and sound effects by Mario "Chrome" Prato, 4k Race is a testament to minimalistic brilliance, offering a thrilling race against time and rivals in a visually captivating experience. Get ready for heart-pounding moments in this racing masterpiece where every second counts!
